quests.name: Survive the Inferno
quests.description: Descend into the treacherous depths of the 'Magma Caverns' where molten danger lurks at every turn. Face 'Lava Elementals' and 'Fire Drakes' to survive the searing heat.

quests.name: Hunt the Firelord's Heart
quests.description: Embark on a perilous quest to hunt down the 'Firelord's Heart,' a legendary source of infernal power hidden within the 'Magma Caverns.' Beware of cunning traps and fiery guardians.

quests.name: Forging with Fire
quests.description: Assist a skilled blacksmith on a mission to gather rare 'Molten Ores' deep within the 'Magma Caverns.' Defend against 'Magma Elementals' while collecting the valuable resources.

quests.name: The Obsidian Enigma
quests.description: Investigate the mystery of the 'Obsidian Enigma,' a rare and enigmatic gemstone. Traverse treacherous lava flows and battle 'Obsidian Golems' to unveil its secrets.

quests.name: Rise of the Phoenix
quests.description: Witness the rebirth of the legendary 'Phoenix' deep within the 'Magma Caverns.' Protect the newborn phoenix from threats as it gains its fiery strength.
